group_1.textCenter: Ah, mmm... Huh? How come I...

group_1.textRight: Oh, I— I'm s-so sorry!@Wh-why did I do that to you...

group_1.textLeft: Shirogane, calm down.

group_1.textRight: But I have no clue why I tried to choke you...!

group_1.textLeft: As you can see, I'm fine here.
As long as nothing happened, there is no reason@to blame you, Shirogane.
And besides,
it's also part of the role of us Magical Girls
to rescue those who have been manipulated by@Witches, like you.

group_1.textRight: Magical Girls... Witches...?@What are you talking about, Senpai...?

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps the phenomenon a moment ago could@spare us some explanation.
The reason you laid a hand on me was due to a@being known as a Witch.
And I am a Magical Girl who fights those Witches.
Just now, I defeated the Witch that was@manipulating you.

group_1.textRight: I was being controlled by a Witch, and the@Magical Girl Himuro-senpai defeated it...?

group_1.textLeft: That's a good interpretation.
Witches are also the cause of the incidents and@accidents that happen in this world.
I think the reason you were harmed is because@there was an opening in your heart.
Maybe it's because of the weird things I said@out of the blue that you got anxious.
I apologize.
This is the other side of me that I wanted to tell@you about.

group_1.textRight: I see, Himuro-senpai saves a lot of people like me...

group_1.textLeft: But the irony is that although Magical Girls@defeat Witches,
Witches are what Magical Girls end up becoming@when they run out of power.
I wouldn't say it's all good.

group_1.textRight: I still find it difficult to swallow everything you@just said.

group_1.textLeft: No wonder. I myself am the same way...

group_1.textRight: With the words of the few people I can trust,@I swallow them first.
Reflecting and digesting can be done afterwards.
And plus, they are your words, Himuro-senpai.

group_1.textLeft: ...Thank you, Shirogane.
No, I think there's another Witch out there,@so I'm going to go for a bit.
See you next time, then.

group_1.textRight: No way, she just jumped off of the roof...

group_1.textCenter: To move that fast, Himuro-senpai, you really are...
